title: League is breaking my mouse
body: When i use my mouse in everyday use it works fine. But when i sign into league and play a game its like my mouse gets stuck on certain spots on the screen. It almost feels like the mouse is glitching on the screen. I have tried almost everything i can possibly think of to fix this issue. Can you please help me.

replies.body:
I've seen a lot of background apps such as Discord and Skype cause these types of issues when displaying notifications and trying to take window focus from League. I recommend [completing a clean boot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) to ensure those apps aren't causing this to happen.

Let me know if this caused any change.
I Don't even have skype installed and what is discord lol. I just tried syching the dongle so i only have 1 for both the keyboard and mouse. to see if it helps.
